name: Castle of the Land
description:
Set in an old fantasy world where castle walls are attacked by hordes of orcs, a group of adventurers will defend the castle at all costs. Move-in 4 beautiful directions, listen to a beautiful soundtrack and face down hordes of orcs with an army of knights and adventurers at your side.

Castle of the land is a top-down adventure game where the player fights hordes of orcs alongside knights and questing adventurers. You will defend forts and towns and deliver a mysterious letter to a wizard.
